casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2007-0509. State v. Broyles.

Stark App. 2006CA00170, 2007-Ohio-487. Disci’etionary appeal accepted; cause held for the decision in 2007-0052, State v. Simpkins, Cuyahoga App. No. 87692, 2006-Ohio-6028; and briefing schedule stayed.

Lanzinger, J., dissents.
